overview: Popular Muscleman Marco Rossi makes his BG wrestling debut. Jeremy Tucker, possessing one of the most muscle defined and sexiest bodies BG has ever videotaped, also debuts in this BG Wrestling video. The last time Marco Rossi appeared in a video was 1996. At that time he was 24 yo, considerably lighter, with much less muscle. This is Marco's 21st Century debut - the new Marco. 200# of solid muscle and under development. When BG first approached Marco about doing a wrestling video, Marco wasn't sure he could do it. But in the first few minutes when he's on the mat grappling with Jeremy Tucker, it's like "I was born to the mat", Marco told BG after the bout.
title: Fantasy Oil Wrestling 3
